page.title: 07GALA DAY IN FOUR MARKS
page.content: GALA DAY: Every year in our village of Four Marks, we have a Gala Day. This usually takes place in June. This year, 1985, it was on Saturday June 22nd. On Gala Day there is a procession of floats from Winston Rise to the Recreation Ground. The floats are judged and various cups are awarded in different categories. At the recreation ground there are various stalls and acts in the arena. This year there was a clown display and two members from the British Trampoline Club. There is usually a slide, provided by Dan Air, the local airline. It is a big rubber slide, blown up with chalk put on it to make you slide better. There are also teas, cakes, ice-cream and hot dogs available.
